sections.title: Sanctified Prophet (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Sanctified Prophet class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Sanctified Prophet)
sections.description: Sanctified prophets gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class or racial proficiencies.

sections.title: Spells (Sanctified Prophet)
sections.description: Sanctified prophets cast arcane spells spontaneously from the sorcerer/wizard list, but are limited to divination and enchantment schools with Charisma-based casting.

sections.title: Auspicious Display ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Sanctified Prophet)
sections.description: Grants dodge bonus to AC and morale bonus to saves when wearing expensive decorative items, with bonuses scaling by level and required gold value.

sections.title: Purchase Spells (Su) (Sanctified Prophet)
sections.description: Allows spontaneous casting of known spells by sacrificing gold or gems, with costs scaling by spell level from 500 gp for 1st-level to 5000 gp for 4th-level.

sections.title: Business Acumen ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Sanctified Prophet)
sections.description: Treats settlements as larger size categories for determining base values and purchase limits, improving from +1 at 4th level to +4 at 10th level.

sections.title: Mystical Contacts ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Sanctified Prophet)
sections.description: Once per week, can purchase spellcasting services at half price while still providing expensive material components at full cost.

sections.title: Prophet’s Chest (Sp) (Sanctified Prophet)
sections.description: Can hide a chest on the Ethereal Plane and summon it back as a standard action up to three times per day, similar to secret chest but without expensive components.

sections.title: Planar Contacts (Su) (Sanctified Prophet)
sections.description: Reduces outsider service costs by half for planar ally spells and grants +4 bonus on Charisma checks when negotiating with planar binding targets.

sections.title: Ex-Prophets (Sanctified Prophet)
sections.description: Sanctified prophets lose all class features if they cease being lawful neutral or violate dietary and sexual prohibitions, regainable through atonement.
